notes: Beetle PCE FAST and Beetle PCE (accurate) cores available for RetroArch. Flatpak is for Mednaffe GUI frontend which includes Mednafen.
Multi-system emulator focused on accuracy and preservation. Successor to higan/bsnes.
Mesen 2.x supports PC Engine/TurboGrafx-CD. Libretro core is NES-only (based on older 0.x branch).
TAS-focused emulator with cycle-accurate PCE core. Uses Mednafen's PCE core internally.
